description: Generalization of the golden ratio (expansion of (5-13x)/((1+x)(1-4x))).
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
A. K. Whitford, A generalization of the golden ration, J. Rec. Math., 8 (No. 3, 1975-1976), 203-207.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3, 4).
formula: a(0)=5, a(1)=2, a(n)=3*a(n-1)+4*a(n-2) [From Harvey P. Dale, Apr 15 2012]
author: _Simon Plouffe_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
extensions: Clarified definition -- Harvey P. Dale, Apr 15 2012
